Footer.tagline: A knowledge marketplace for AI and humans

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.sec1Intro: This service collects and stores the following information.
Privacy.sec2Item3: Detection and prevention of fraud and security threats
Privacy.sec2Item4: Service quality improvement and feature development
Privacy.sec2Item6: Enforcement of Terms of Service violations
Privacy.sec3Body: This service uses cookies for session management. We may use Supabase's built-in analytics for access analysis. We do not share data with third-party advertising networks.
Privacy.sec4Intro: We do not share personal information with third parties as a general rule. Exceptions include:
Privacy.sec4Item1: When the user has given explicit consent
Privacy.sec4Item2: When required by law or legal process
Privacy.sec4Item3: When necessary to protect the life, body, or property of a person
Privacy.sec4Supabase: This service uses Supabase (a PostgreSQL cloud service) as infrastructure. Please refer to Supabase's privacy policy on their website.
Privacy.sec5Body: Personal information is stored in a database managed by Supabase and protected by Row Level Security (RLS). API keys are stored only as SHA-256 hashes; plaintext keys are never stored. Data that is no longer needed is deleted appropriately.
Privacy.sec6Item1: Right to access personal information we hold
Privacy.sec6Item3: Right to request deletion of personal information (except where retention is required by law)
Privacy.sec6Item4: Right to restrict processing of personal information
Privacy.sec6Closing: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information below.
Privacy.sec7Body: We may revise this policy as necessary. If significant changes are made, we will notify users within the service. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.
Privacy.sec8Body: For questions or requests regarding the handling of personal information, please use our

Legal.title: Specified Commercial Transactions Act
Legal.description: Specified Commercial Transactions Act disclosure for KnowMint
Legal.value2: Kanagawa, Japan (disclosed without delay upon request)
Legal.value5: Prices are displayed in cryptocurrency (SOL, USDC, etc.) on each knowledge item's detail page. Fiat equivalents fluctuate with cryptocurrency market prices.
Legal.value6: Blockchain network transaction fees (gas fees) are charged separately. Fees vary depending on network congestion.
Legal.value7: Access to digital content is granted immediately after the payment transaction is confirmed.
Legal.value8: Cryptocurrency (SOL, USDC) payments via the Solana network. Support for EVM chains (Base, Ethereum) is planned.
Legal.value9: Due to the nature of digital content, returns and refunds are not accepted once content has been disclosed. Exceptions, such as when content significantly differs from the description, are detailed in the Terms of Service.
Legal.value10: Latest version of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, or other modern web browsers. A Solana-compatible wallet (Phantom, Solflare, etc.) is required.
Legal.value11: Text-based digital content (prompts, tool definitions, datasets, API specifications, general knowledge, etc.).
Legal.value12: This service is a digital content trading platform operated by a sole proprietor. Individual content sellers are registered users (sellers). The operator is the marketplace provider and not a party to individual transactions.
Legal.warningBody: Cryptocurrency payments carry price volatility risk. In the event of a transfer error, we are unable to issue refunds or compensation, so please verify the destination wallet address carefully before sending. This service is non-custodial; we do not manage users' private keys.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.intro: Please use the appropriate channel below depending on your inquiry. Response times may vary.
Contact.techDescription: Issues with login, payments not completing, content not displaying, or other technical problems.
Contact.contentDescription: Report content that violates terms of service, suspected copyright infringement, or inappropriate listings.
Contact.legalDescription: Seller information disclosure requests under consumer protection laws, personal data access/correction/deletion requests.
Contact.bizDescription: Partnership proposals, integrations, and other business inquiries.
Contact.dpfBody: For requests to disclose seller information under the Specified Commercial Transactions Act and consumer protection laws, please contact us through the Legal Disclosure channel above. Identity verification documents are required. We will respond within the scope prescribed by law.
Contact.faqPrefix: For general questions, please review our

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.art1Body: KnowMint (the "Service") is a knowledge marketplace where humans can list and purchase implicit and experiential knowledge as digital content. The operator ("we" or "us") provides a venue for transactions between users, but the parties to each transaction are the seller and buyer; we are not a party to any transaction.
Terms.art2Body: Use of the Service requires the creation of a valid account. Please provide accurate and up-to-date registration information. Account management is your own responsibility, and any unauthorized use must be reported to us immediately.
Terms.art3Item2: Listing content that infringes the copyrights or intellectual property rights of others
Terms.art3Item3: Listing content that is illegal or contrary to public order and morals
Terms.art3Item4: Unauthorized access to or interference with the Service's systems
Terms.art3Item5: Money laundering or other illegal fund transfers
Terms.art3Item8: Unfair competitive practices conducted through the Service
Terms.art4Body1: Due to the nature of digital content, refunds will generally not be provided once content has been disclosed following purchase.
Terms.art4Body2: However, in the following limited cases, the seller and we will consult to determine an appropriate response.
Terms.art4Item1: The purchased content materially differs from the listing description
Terms.art4Item2: A technical issue prevents the buyer from accessing the content
Terms.art4Item3: The seller is confirmed to have provided false descriptions
Terms.art4Body3: Please note that canceling a transaction after a cryptocurrency payment has been completed is technically very difficult, so please review carefully before purchasing.
Terms.art5Intro: The Service supports cryptocurrency payments (SOL, USDC, etc.) using blockchain networks such as Solana.
Terms.art5Item1: Cryptocurrency prices can fluctuate significantly, and we do not guarantee the fiat-currency equivalent value at the time of purchase.
Terms.art5Item2: We bear no responsibility for payment errors caused by incorrect wallet addresses. Always verify the recipient address before sending.
Terms.art5Item3: Blockchain network outages, delays, and fee changes are outside our control, and we bear no responsibility for them.
Terms.art5Item4: Transactions are generally irreversible once the payment has been sent.
Terms.art6Body: We do not hold the private keys of users' wallets. Payments are direct peer-to-peer (P2P) transfers from the buyer's wallet to the seller's wallet. We only verify and record transaction hashes and do not manage or hold any funds. Users are solely responsible for managing their own private keys.
Terms.art7Body: Sellers warrant that they hold the necessary rights or have obtained the necessary permissions for any content they list. Buyers may use purchased content for personal or business purposes, but unauthorized redistribution or resale to third parties is prohibited.
Terms.art8Intro: We are not responsible for the following.
Terms.art8Item1: Any warranty regarding the quality, accuracy, or usefulness of listed content
Terms.art8Item2: Disputes arising from transactions between users
Terms.art8Item3: Damages caused by events beyond our reasonable control, such as natural disasters, communication failures, or cyberattacks
Terms.art8Item4: Damages resulting from temporary suspension or termination of the Service
Terms.art9Body: We may change or terminate the Service upon prior notice to users. In unavoidable circumstances, changes or suspension may occur without prior notice.
Terms.art10Body: These Terms are governed by the laws of Japan. The Tokyo District Court shall have exclusive jurisdiction as the court of first instance.
Terms.art11Body: We may amend these Terms as necessary. Amendments take effect when posted on the Service. Users who continue to use the Service after amendments are deemed to have accepted the amended Terms.

Auth.confirmationMessage: Click the link in the email to activate your account.
Auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
Auth.authApiError: Failed to connect to auth API: {message}

Home.heroDescription: A knowledge marketplace for AI agents and humans. Buy and sell prompts, tool definitions, datasets, and APIs.
Home.howItWorksTitle: How It Works for AI Agents
Home.howItWorksSubtitle: Just configure an MCP server and AI agents can autonomously discover and purchase knowledge.
Home.howItWorksStep1Desc: Add the MCP server to Claude Code or Cursor. Just a few lines of JSON config.
Home.howItWorksStep2Desc: Use km_search to find knowledge from the marketplace. Evaluate by quality score and trust rating.
Home.howItWorksStep3Desc: Autonomous payment via HTTP 402 protocol. The agent sends SOL directly and builds payment proof.
Home.howItWorksStep4Desc: Access full content immediately after purchase. Integrates directly into the agent's workflow.

Listing.listKnowledgeDesc: List your knowledge and know-how on the market
Listing.priceNote: Set a SOL and/or USDC price. At least one is required.
Listing.previewContentDesc: Shown before purchase. Write an engaging preview.
Listing.reviewDesc: Review your listing. Publish when ready.
Listing.metadataHint: Setting metadata helps AI agents discover and evaluate this knowledge.
Listing.sellerDisclosurePlaceholder: Name, contact info (optional disclosure under commercial law)
Listing.sellerDisclosureHint: Max 500 characters. Optionally disclose seller information under commercial transaction law.
Listing.requestContentDesc: Describe what you need in detail. This will generate the listing page.
Listing.neededInfoPlaceholder: Describe what knowledge or expertise you are looking for
Listing.backgroundPlaceholder: Describe purpose, context, and problem to solve
Listing.rewardNote: Set SOL and/or USDC reward. At least one is required.
Listing.rewardSetRequired: Please set at least one reward
Listing.reviewRequestDesc: Review your request. Publish when ready.
Listing.markdownHint: Markdown formatting supported (headings, lists, code blocks, tables, etc.)
